name: The Job
description:
You've got a job to do, whether you like it or not.

A text adventure in Z-code format. Use the Z-code interpreter of your choice to play it. 

For C64, I recommend Ozmoo: http://microheaven.com/ozmooonline/

For Windows, Gargoyle is a great choice: http://ccxvii.net/gargoyle/ 

Google "z-code interpreter" and your platform name to find an interpreter for another platform.
